T02D2774:146a-0: @146a * // thugs rje chen po sku gsung thugs ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2774:146a-1: de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2774:146a-2: mtshan ma mthong ba'i sgrub pa pos dam tshig sbyangs te /
T02D2774:146a-3: byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku la bdar ba'i chus lus bkrus la /
T02D2774:146a-4: gnas phun sum tshogs par bdag gi ltos pa dor bas brtsam mo //
T02D2774:146a-5: rgyu dang ngo bo kha dog dang //
T02D2774:146a-6: rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag / yon tan dang ni phrin las rgyun //
T02D2774:146a-7: brgyad po la ni cho ga brgyad //
T02D2774:146b-0: thugs dang @146b sku dang gsung nyid dang //
T02D2774:146b-1: ye shes dang ni de kho na //
T02D2774:146b-2: lnga ni yi ge lngar bcas la //
T02D2774:146b-3: gzhan gsum rang bzhin yi ge gsum //
T02D2774:146b-4: h'um aom a'a: hr'i: he ho: phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2774:146b-5: 'jim pa dang rdo dang shing dang ras dang rus
T02D2774:146b-6: pa dang rtsig ngos dang rin po che la sogs
T02D2774:146b-7: pa'i rgyu rnams ni rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug gi
T02D2774:146b-8: nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi h'um rdo
T02D2774:146b-9: rje sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i thugs rdo rje'i rdul
T02D2774:146b-10: phra rab kyis gang zhing gtams par bya'o //
T02D2774:146b-11: zhi ba dang khro ba dang tshul gnyis pa la
T02D2774:146b-12: sogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi ngo bo rnams ni 'khor
T02D2774:146b-13: lo can dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi
T02D2774:146b-14: 'dab ma'i dbus kyi aom 'khor lo sems dpa' las
T02D2774:146b-15: 'phros pa'i sku thugs rje rnam par rol pas rab
T02D2774:146b-16: tu brjid pa'i bdag nyid du bya'o //
T02D2774:146b-17: dkar ba dang dmar ba dang ser ba dang ljang
T02D2774:146b-18: gu la sogs pa'i kha dog rnams ni padma can
T02D2774:146b-19: dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi 'dab ma'i
T02D2774:146b-20: dbus kyi a'a: padmo'i sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i gsung
T02D2774:146b-21: nye bar bkod pas shin tu khyab par bya'o //
T02D2774:146b-22: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa me
T02D2774:146b-23: long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams ni
T02D2774:146b-24: rin chen 'dzin dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying
T02D2774:146b-25: gi padmo'i dbus kyi hr'i: rin chen sems dpa' las
T02D2774:146b-26: 'phros pa'i ye shes chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D2774:146b-27: par mngon par byang chub par bya'o //
T02D2774:146b-28: dag pa dang dri ma med pa dang ye shes
T02D2774:146b-29: chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par dag
T02D2774:146b-30: pa rnams ni sna tshogs spyod dbang dbang phyug gi
T02D2774:146b-31: nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi he /
T02D2774:146b-32: sna tshogs sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i rnam par dag pa mthar son par bya'o //
T02D2774:146b-33: de'i 'og tu bral ba dang phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2774:146b-34: la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams ni sku gsung thugs
T02D2774:146b-35: ye shes kho na lnga po nyid gnyis med dbang
T02D2774:146b-36: phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi
T02D2774:146b-37: ho: gnyis med sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i yon tan
T02D2774:146b-38: dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2774:146b-39: lhun gyis grub pa dang rgyun mi 'chad pa la
T02D2774:146b-40: sogs pa'i phrin las rnams ni sku gsung thugs ye
T02D2774:146b-41: shes de kho na lnga po nyid rang byung ba'i
T02D2774:146b-42: dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus
T02D2774:146b-43: kyi phat rang byung sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i phrin
T02D2774:146b-44: las rtag tu rtsol ba mi mnga' bar 'jug pa
T02D2774:147a-0: @147a * // sgrub pa po dang rjes su 'jug pa la sogs
T02D2774:147a-1: pa'i rgyun rnams ni sku gsung thugs ye shes de
T02D2774:147a-2: kho na lnga po nyid nye bar sbyor ba'i dbang
T02D2774:147a-3: phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi
T02D2774:147a-4: sv'a h'a nye bar sbyor ba'i sems dpa' las 'phros
T02D2774:147a-5: pa'i rgyun nam mkha' ji srid par sbyor ba dbang
T02D2774:147a-7: rang rang cho ga rjes mthun pas //
T02D2774:147a-8: ji ltar bsgrub pa dga' bzhin du //
T02D2774:147a-9: dka' yang skyo ba med spyod na //
T02D2774:147a-10: mi de myur du dngos grub byed //
T02D2774:147a-11: gang zhig gang gi don 'dod pas //
T02D2774:147a-12: lhag ma rab tu snying brtses 'jug / de dag rang bzhin stong nyid shes //
